parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The ID of the job template.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 0 to 10000.

parameters.name: State
parameters.description:
The status of the job. Valid values:

*   **0**: The job is not executed.
*   **1**: The job is executed.
*   **2**: The job fails to be executed.
*   **3**: The job is being executed.
